Predictions from time series models

Source: R/stats-time-series.R
suggest_sweep.Rd

safepredict does not support time series models. We recommend using sweep.

suggest_sweep(object, new_data, type, ...)

# S3 method for ar
safe_predict(object, new_data, type, ...)

# S3 method for Arima
safe_predict(object, new_data, type, ...)

# S3 method for Arima0
safe_predict(object, new_data, type, ...)

# S3 method for HoltWinters
safe_predict(object, new_data, type, ...)

# S3 method for StructTS
safe_predict(object, new_data, type, ...)

object

Ignored.

Ignored.
